website_summaries.verdict: This swim cap offers good durability, as well as an attractive look, but it may not be the best choice for those with longer hair.
pros: Available in black or white, each with the US flag design
cons: Some complaints that this cap is smaller than expected, or that it rides up as you're swimming

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: This cap ripped right up the back the very first time my swimmer attempted to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not made in USA
customer_reviews.text: Decent product but would rather pay a little more fire something that’s not made in China.
customer_reviews.author: M. sharif

customer_reviews.title: One of my best!
customer_reviews.text: Love the swimming cap. It is easy to apply and it doesn't pull your hair. It stays in place
customer_reviews.author: Filomena R. Goncalves

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: as a 3-4 times a week swimmer, I wanted to protect my hair from further damages. I love the design, but the cap slides up, and after 3 -4 laps finally off. My hair still gets wet, and the cap needs to be pulled down every other lap - quite annoying. And all of that with a regular, not big head size.....
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: 100 % silicone, antiallergic, gr8 fit and quality made cap.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a great cap. TYR is getting better every day. I hope they continue improvements made already to produce pro style product for swimmers. Thanks again. Andrei.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei Maximov

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: Wore it one time Second time the side ripped off Ordering Speedo
customer_reviews.author: Molly Holcombe

customer_reviews.title: No leaking and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I do competition swimming in highschool and this was perfect I am tender headed and the soft inside didn't pull on my hair like other caps
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: if you have long long hair not big enough and eventually tore
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: May rip when putting on
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving it a second chance because the first on ripped a chunk out of the front when my son put it on for a meet. So one star for now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not for Kid Head
customer_reviews.text: Very nice swim cap, but way too big for a 3 year old head. He will grow into it, though!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and quality. Perhaps a bit warmer than latex but the wrinkle free handling makes it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: SamP

customer_reviews.title: TYR Silicone Cap
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well and tight. Seems durable and has not ripped after numerous long daily swims. Sometimes it rides up my ears, although it may not yet be stretched to fit my rather large head yet. The only downfall is this USA swim cap is manufactured in China.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Perfect swim cap
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my daughter who is studying in China. She loves to show off her USA colors at the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Diebel

customer_reviews.title: My Niece Thought I Got This From The Olympic Training Center
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my niece who just joined a swim team and she thinks I purchased this from the Olympic Training Center. The colors don't fade and hold up in the sun and chlorine, and the cap itself is well made. I would purchase this again and recommend it to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Eric T

customer_reviews.title: Great caps
customer_reviews.text: Great materials , easy to put on. I love this product. I would definitely continue to buy from this brand after trying many others
customer_reviews.author: Carmina Rosales

customer_reviews.title: Swimming cap
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, I love to swim with it. Easy to place and seems it will last for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Patrick Martin

customer_reviews.title: Leaky...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth your money...water in my daughters ears immediately! Looks great though! Save your money if you are looking for a cap to keep water out of ears
customer_reviews.author: JenShubz

customer_reviews.title: Swim cap
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this swim cap! Can't wait to wear it. Go USA. silicone is great and thick. Shipped quickly and price was great
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4

product_meta.title: TYR USA Silicone Cap
product_meta.description: TYR Sport was established in 1985 to provide the competitive swim market with vibrant, performance-driven prints. Since its inception three decades ago, TYR has grown to exist as one of the world’s most recognizable swimming and triathlon brands. With global distributors and an international following, TYR remains dedicated to building the industry’s most durable, uniquely designed swimsuits, cutting edge equipment and innovative caps and goggles. On a relentless path to push the limits of sportswear we not only reimagine technologies for enhanced competitive performance, but also embrace lifestyle markets to accommodate athletes and water enthusiasts at every level.
feature_bullets: Made using the highest quality materials
Tested to give you the edge in all your activities
Used by both professional and recreational users
Popular in the racing world durable and long lasting color
